### expirationDuration?

```ts
optional expirationDuration: number;
```

Defined in: [async-queuer.ts:23](https://github.com/TanStack/pacer/blob/main/packages/pacer/src/async-queuer.ts#L23)

Maximum time in milliseconds that an item can stay in the queue
If not provided, items will never expire

***

### getIsExpired()?

```ts
optional getIsExpired: (item, addedAt) => boolean;
```

Defined in: [async-queuer.ts:28](https://github.com/TanStack/pacer/blob/main/packages/pacer/src/async-queuer.ts#L28)

If provided, this overrides the expirationDuration behavior

### getPriority()?

```ts
optional getPriority: (item) => number;
```

Defined in: [async-queuer.ts:39](https://github.com/TanStack/pacer/blob/main/packages/pacer/src/async-queuer.ts#L39)

Function to determine priority of items in the queuer
Higher priority items will be processed first
If not provided, will use static priority values attached to tasks

#### Parameters

##### item

`TFn`

#### Returns

`number`
